name: Asteroid Blast (Bhuvi7)
description:
Experience fun and adventure in our thrilling asteroid shooter. Use the arrow keys to move your ship and press 'X' to shoot. Destroy as many asteroids as you can to level up your ship. Do not get hit too much as your ship might explode! Collect yellow health points to maintain your ship's integrity.

Made by - Bhavishya, Billy, Trinity, and Will
